Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive test suite and fix critical issues

- Created 25 comprehensive tests \(API, models, services, integrations, utils\)
- Fixed langchain import errors \(updated to new API\)
- Added missing prometheus_client dependency
- Created logs directory
- Added test report and documentation
- Test coverage: 44% baseline established
- All 54 Python files validated

Tests passing: 24/25 \(1 skipped\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
